content.detailedDescription: I was stationed at 29 palms in the marine corps. in september of 1966 around 10 pm a friend came into the barracks and said for me to come outside and see something strange. i went out , he pointed to the ne above a small mountain and there were 3 red lights blinking slowly . i said they must have built 3 new radio towers . he replied no stay here and watch them, after about 1 minute the object shot straight up about 1 mile stopped for a few seconds then shot back to original position , the lights change to orange then back to red. the object then shot to the right about a mile , paused then shot back to the original position out of nowhere came a 4th light that shot to the middle of the triangle then the object became real bright then dim then bright the it shot out of sight within 10 seconds'
content.summary: Three lights in triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Since i had seen something the night before i had woke early in the morning about 12:30 and just for the heck of it looked in the area where i had seen something the night before . nothing observed at that time. at 2:15 i woke again to get ready for work. went outside to look in that area again and saw nothing . got ready for work headed out the door and there it was again. this was at 3:00 in the morning just sort of hovering around seemed like it danced around in the sky.It was just as the previous night. attempted to go to work get my papers ready for delivery and get to the shoreline to see if it was still around . at the shoreline it clear of trees and can see the entire sky almost. seems it was gone no trace of it. at this place on the shoreline is where i have first witnessed this craft . i do have a brief video of this craft. i was closer to this craft when i had first seen it and was able to video it . i am attempting to get more coverage of it since the video is very short. want as many persons aware of this and have the evidence beyond the shadow of doubt. i have to say that in my 55 years on this planet did i ever expect to see anything like this . my mother told me of a story when she and a friend witnessed a cigar shaped thing i shrugged it off thinking i never will see anything like what i have seen two days in a row . i think its starting to make me fear that something is going to happen in the near future . i have been watching t.V. programs that has something to do with this matter . like the roswell rock . this object has been found ten years ago and just hearing about it now( wow) are we slow or what. some may say that these visits from e t may have something with the atom smasher experiments. science is gearing up for a more powered up test. should we worry yes maybe no. what will we learn and what could happen as a result of these tests . i wonder !
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Second sighting 2 days in a row same time same area .

content.detailedDescription: On the night of aug 23, 2014 i was standing on my balcony watching various satellites and meteors in a beautifully clear night sky.  i noticed something moving to the south and realised i was looking at 7 or 8 chevron shaped objects flying very fast on a straight path northward. i spoke out loud asking myself "what is that?" and was fixed staring at the objects as they flew directly overhead.  the objects looked kind of dark orange or red with no exterior lights.  the surface looked to have a matt finish and it was hard to pick them out from the black sky. as the objects moved away to the north i felt the hairs on the back of my neck standing up, i had goosebumps and my eyes had filled with tears.  i have never seen anything as clear as that before, something that i could not even explain with alternatives. they were not aircraft that i know of, there was no sound, definitely not birds, they had a solid looking exterior and must have been travelling extremely fast as they traversed the entire sky in less 30 seconds. this experience has left me a little traumatised in that i can not get the image of them out of my head.  i wished that i'd tried to photograph the event but it all happened so fast and also i was mesmerised by their appearance.
content.summary: Fleet of chevron shaped craft moving from south to north very fast

content.detailedDescription: This was yesterday afternoon when two of us went up in the terrace. we were roaming around as we saw a reflection in the sky suddenly. initially after having a casual look at the ball like particle, we had a concentrated view of it. it was golden in color. we first saw it at the northern part of the sky.  it was blinking sequentially and there was a light emission. my friend even took out his phone to take a snap of it. but the phone hanged and the screen got cracked off. although this incident went on just for 15 secs approximately but the after effects were stunning. the electricity went on low voltage that got fluctuating constantly for an hour. coincidentally the sky went cloudy and the atmosphere  changed radically resulting into rain. the whole situation left us amazed. though we did not had any instruments for the verification of this event but we have eye witnesses about it. we are very sure that this mysterious events are interlinked and has got something to do with extra terrestrial activity. this incident left us stunned and we would like to examine more on this. but we lack in proper instrumentation. so we cordially want your cooperation in this matter to proceed forward.
content.summary: We saw this ball-like reflective particle flashing sequentially over and over for around a few secs, while we went up in the terrace yesterday afternoon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in meridian, id for business staying at the best western hotel. i had just got back to the hotel and when i got out of my car i saw a bright light in the sky to the nw.... i thought it was a plane because the light was so bright but it wasn't moving, it was just hovering across meridian ave. after hovering for about 2 minutes it started moving se towards my position. the first time it completely disappeared during the video it went behind a telephone pole... then as it moved se / e direction it was mostly blocked from visibility because of a tree... when it emerged from behind the tree it looked sort of metallic with a bright light in the 'front' and a smaller dimmer light in the 'rear' (front and rear references based on direction of travel)... it continued to move towards the east and went behind a shopping center sign and a parking lot light and then finally behind some trees to the e direction and ultimately those trees blocked any further view/filming of the object.

honestly i don't know what it was... i don't believe it was a plane or helicopter because it seemed like it was only a couple hundred yards away from me and i didn't hear any noise at all from it. there also weren't any blinking lights which i always see when i see planes/helicopters flying in the night sky.

i'm very interested to know if there were any other reported sightings on this day and this time in meridian, id and i am very interested to hear professional opinions about the video i captured (taken using my samsung galaxy s3 -- sorry for the shakey video!)

i'm also including a map with a red 'x' that represents my position (facing ne) and blue 'x' that represents the position of the object when i first saw it and a black line that represents the path it traveled to the best of my knowledge :o)
content.summary: Saw a bright light hovering then it slowly moved to the east of my position

content.detailedDescription:
1. a friend and i went outside to smoke since it is not allowed in the house.

2. immediately, and before my eyes could adjust, i noticed a low flying object directly south of my position, heading in a n,ne direction(front door of house faces south). we moved away from the house, so the indoor lights would not hinder the view of the night sky. at this point, we witnessed two similar objects west of my location. they stayed west of us and proceeded north. i was unable to firm up a decent description or comparison to other ufos seen tonight. they were just a bit to far for my eyes. another single object appeared ne of us. the ufo that i originally observed and this object passed in close proximity (100-200 yards @ same altitude >500ft). two more object of similar fashion could be seen in the far nw and far nne of my location. they flew at a much higher altitude most likely, but at that distance, i am well aware of my skewed field of perception.

3. my original thoughts when i noticed the ufos was sarcastic. this is the norm in the south graves county sky- flying discs, star-like orbs, other triangle shaped aircraft, along with military or evac/airlift type of helicopters. my sarcasm is also a device to hide a bit of fear from myself. this fear is a result of past experiences that involve extraterrestrial encounters (not abductions events) among other things. i don't want to publish it for all to read. that said, i feel like the us military is piloting the craft i witnessed tonight. if ets are piloting these ufos, they are working alongside the government, not opposing them. nothing about these nightly events suggest a security patrol, a national security threat or operational tactic. my guess is that these are instructional flights to train men and women to pilot new technology. that said, such things make one feel a bit powerless. while i typically see ufo's every night (beginning approx 2.5 - 3 months ago) the exception would be nights with a full moon or overcast. 

4. *motion* regarding tonight's events -as well as all other ufos events- the craft moved in a glider/ghost like fashion. they bank in an odd way, and seem more fluid and agile than any living or built thing in the sky. it reminds me of bob ross' grace with a loaded paintbrush across a fresh canvas. 
*sound* likewise, these things are silent until after they have passed overhead and a bit of distance has come between the rear of the craft and myself. it sounds like a rolling jet engine (large commercial engine sound typical of 757) more than anything, but the ufos sing tenor while united airlines sings bass. 
*craft lighting* abnormally bright white lights (halogen/led bluish-white are located on the belly of the craft. these lights are bright. the stayed on without any deviance, and just seemed to barely illuminate the body of the craft. in a triangle formation, 3 red lights stood at each angle. unlike all of the the other triangle craft, two of the lights were on either side of the forward moving/front end, while a single light was at the rear. this, along with the slight glimps provided by the white lights, gave the appearance of a triangle. the triangle craft seen previously had one red light at the nose, and two on the ends of the wings. also, the previous triangle craft emitted a glow that i assume is from the burning of fuel, but it was only observable from the rear, and sometimes hard to see if not absent on a few of these craft. tonight, this same glow or light coloration was towards the rear, but not in a standard fighter jet locations. 

5. my feelings regarding tonight's sky along with the other observations i have made equate to frustration, suspicion, and isolated. the isolation is a result of being the one guy alive that simply states the observable-  the emperor is naked. my ex-wife gave me the are you 'okay' bit. so, here i a, seeing unbelievable things all the time without any conversation to really be had, lest i risk appearing crazy. if i had a camera with the proper lenses or access to hq video equipment, i could get over these feelings of helplessness regarding this crazy sky. i have one friend that i can talk to about these things. if she had witnessed several of these events, i would have no one to talk to. when did we quit looking up at the sky?

6. a few flew out of my line of sight, but frankly it was boring compared to other nights. i just went inside after 30 or so minutes.

worth noting: a) there seems to be a correlation with these sightings and the tireless barking of neighborhood dogs. the barking sounds like someone or something unwelcomed/unknown is trespassing in every single dogs territory. it's unsettling. b) at the onset of this recent string of events, i, as well as one other observer, noticed the seemingly overnight construction of cellphone type towers that are fitted with elf and gwen technology. i count 7 such towers in our near the city limits. mayfield is very small, and only has a population of 10k. i can only speculate. of course, correlation is not causation, and at this point it is more coincidence. c) frequently ufos will turn off all exterior lights and become invisible from the ground. on these nights, they only seem to turn on lights when in proximity of other craft. the lighting used is star-like in appearance, but they are not orbs. 

my reasons for the report: 

i hope to hear back from mufon or other persons that have means to conduct a solid investigation by phone or email. i haven't even started to tell what all i have seen regarding both ufo and alien encounters. more than that, i would love for someone that is trusted in this community to come and spend a week or two in mayfield/graves county to investigate my accounts, find other leads/witnesses, but primarily photograph, record, and prove me to be the sane one in a town of zeitgeists.
content.summary: Odd triangle shape aircraft with odd lighting and non-typical flight physics

content.detailedDescription: We were outside on a deck when we noticed a bright light moving north across the sky.  it was too big for the space station, and not blinking like a plane.  i thought it might have been a satellite but it was too bright for that and seemed too slow.  it eventually faded from view shortly after we spotted it.  there was some haze in the air from forest fires in the interior of the province.  otherwise, a clear night.
content.summary: Bright star like object streaking across the sky, then fading to nothing

content.detailedDescription: Took the dog out at 10:15 pm and observed a starlike object changing colors.  went in and got binoculars and my hudband and could see what appeared at certain angles to be a large spherical lighted up object hovering high in air.  at other angles it appeared to be triangular but was moving while hovering.  lit up like a christmas tree with pulsing colored lights and beams shooting our from underneath.  i am still going out and checking on it as i tell the story. it is still around at 1:22am.  this is my second sighting of something strange in these skies in a week.  what is going on?  i have always been skeptical.
content.summary: {jd} witnessed a starlike object that was changing colors.  got binoculars and coulf see a large object with lots of lights

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my home when my friend noticed the ball of light i knew it was a ufo and it appeared out of nowhere stayed there for 30 sseconds and then it narrowed and disappeared. i was amazed to what i saw.
content.summary: Round ball of light just appeared out of nowhere saw green light and suddenly the light narrowed into the sky and vanished i had a witness with me

content.detailedDescription: I was out fishing with friends when i noticed this ship just cruising along at a very high altitude . i had no way of getting a picture , but this thing had to be at least a half mile long or longer .It wasn't lit up bright it had a slight glow to it .Nothing fancy . i have seen a lot of things in the night sky and have never seen anything like this . it reminded me of some of the giant ships on the star wars movie . i can draw a pic of it's outline . i will even submit to a lie detector test this thing was gigantic .I have included a very generic pic i made in paint real quick just to give a basic outline . please remember this is just the bottom of the object so i have no idea on how tall this thing was . it was flying in a straight path heading north from my location . it just flew out of visual range . i was amazed at this exp. i spend hours each night looking up at the night sky and can and will say that there is something going on up there . i live in a hotspot for ufo activity .
content.summary: This was a giant ship

content.detailedDescription:
Location: wellington county, ontario, canada

date: winter 1975?

time: 9 pm
number of witnesses: 2

number of objects: 20 approx.

shape of objects: orbs

could your sighting be a ufo balloon/lantern?: no

weather conditions: very cold clear winter evening

description: sighting - approx. 20 orbs, two to three feet in diameter. brightly lit
distance - about 60 feet at the closest
time - around 9 pm
date - 1975? ( see below )
duration of siting - 10 minutes approx.
seen by - mother and son 

it was a very cold clear winter evening. the snow was very crunchy and there was no wind. it was probably the winter of 1974/75. i was around 21 yrs old and was out cross country skiing with my mother on her 100 acre farm. we were skiing towards the back of the farm thru the open field with our two dogs. it was full dark, but probably not much later than nine or so as my mom went to bed fairly early.

about 3/4 of the way back there was a fence that ran at right angles to our direction. a single row of 20 year old or so trees and bushes grew along this fence. our attention was at first drawn to flickering light in these trees. we thought it might be hunters with flashlights out raccoon hunting and we were immediately concerned as our dogs had run on ahead. 

as we got closer we saw a round light float up just above this single row of trees and seem to bob along parallel to the fence for a ways before sinking slowly back down to almost ground level. probably around 30 feet rise / fall. we soon realized that what we thought was flashlights was actually a number of round orbs in amongst the trees. some either on or near the ground, some three or so feet up, and some higher in the trees. they all moved slowly, with slight bobbing motions. it was difficult to estimate how many there were, but our best guess was around twenty. all of the trees were bare, and the lights thru the branches created weird moving shadows on the snow.

as we got closer we called for the dogs, as we didn't know what we were looking at. i had never heard of orbs, nor do i think anyone was reporting seeing them back then. honestly i can't remember what the reaction of the dogs was - whether they were barking at, ignoring, or exhibiting any other odd behaviour towards the orbs.

we got within 20 yards of the fence. the objects seemed totally oblivious to us. they kept on gently rising up, sinking down, bobbing along just above the tree tops or amongst the branches, and just sitting at various heights. the light they gave off was very bright - almost as bright as a full moon on a clear winter night. it was obvious that the orbs were intelligently controlled as they managed to avoid all contact with the tree branches and each other. i would estimate that they were within an area of a couple of hundred feet along the fence line. none ever came closer to us or seemed to stray too far back from this thin tree line. the field beyond was clearly visible thru the fence / trees.

two orbs started to rise faster than usual from opposite ends of the fence line. as they passed tree height they suddenly accelerated to a tremendous rate of speed on what looked like a collision course. from our perspective it looked like they barely missed each other. where their paths crossed the light momentarily flashed much brighter than just double the light. they continued on their individual trajectories until they disappeared from view.

the remainder of the orbs continued to float about. it almost seemed like a ballet with two or three coming close together and then floating apart, others circling each other, etc... very elegant and controlled. beautiful to watch. nothing like balloons caught in the branches. slow, deliberate movement both horizontal and vertical. individual orbs would cover the whole 200 feet horizontally and then return to their starting point.

we eventually decided that they must be some type of ufos, but they were all around two to three feet in diameter ( as best as we could tell based on the fence height ), and not the flying discs that we had read about. how could there be anyone / anything small enough to pilot them?

although my mother and i didn't find the orbs themselves scary, i had read one of the classic ufo books, which talked about flying saucers sucking up animals and taking off. i became concerned that our two dogs were going to be carried off. looking back, how these 3 foot balls were going to lift an irish setter and a yellow lab i don't know. silly.

in total, we watched for around 10 minutes. occasionally another orb would rise up and quickly disappear. quickly as in so fast that they created a continuous blur of light. i don't remember any of these high fliers returning.

as we made our way back to the farmhouse we could still see the orbs floating about ( the orbs were behind us ). the dogs must have followed without a fuss or i would remember that.

once back in the house it sort of sunk in. we weren't freaked out as much as intrigued. odd i know. we often talked about how oddly calm we were.

we were freezing cold, and not willing to put our skis back on and retrace our steps. since our farm is on the corner of two roads, we decided to get in our car and see if we could get back close to the location. unfortunately the sideroad had not been plowed more than a hundred feet or so past the intersection. we never saw the orbs again.

we told the immediate family about what we'd seen over the next few days. none were particularly interested. over the years i've told a few friends, but beyond that nothing. my mother died at 91 last spring. we compared notes about what we remembered sometime during her last year. our memories matched almost identically except for one odd point. she remembered the orbs as giving off red light and i remembered the orbs as giving off pure white light. 

it's probably possible to tie down exactly when this happened. later that same week the guelph newspaper had a picture of what was supposed to have been the clearest ufo picture to date. shot locally. as i remember the picture, it was of a classic saucer shaped craft - not matching at all what we had seen. the coincidence is what stuck with me.

feel free to write back if you would like any further information.

thanks

toronto, ontario
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Approx. 20 orbs, 2 - 3 ft in diameter hovering in & around a single row of trees on fenceline

content.detailedDescription: Was out on 3rd floor balcony patio glanced up at the sky and observed what appeared to be a satellite about the size of a very dim star when it began to accelerate and change directions, sometimes reversing direction and making right angle turns. at one point seemed to flare up in brightness. watched it for approximately 10 to 15 minutes and then lost sight of it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Viewed in sw night sky

content.detailedDescription:
These image were shot on a canon eos rebel t3 digital slr camera. i had it set to shoot in bursts. all 18 shots were taken within 28 seconds of me turning the camera on. the time signature on the images says it was 6:57:06 am but i have to correct the settings on my camera because it was actually in the pm. the sun was coming down in the west and was over my right shoulder. you can see the sun reflecting off some of the stationary objects in some of the images. it was so bright out i could not see if i had the original ufo lined up properly on the camera viewing screen. i pointed and prayed.

 
the original ufo traveled across the sky from east to west. it stopped and hovered in one spot suddenly and that is when i ran for the camera. to the naked eye there was only one object and i was not sure if i was even getting anything captured at all. 

i just put the camera aside after shooting and forgot about the event assuming that i didn't get what i needed. 

i finally loaded the images into the computer this morning (08.25.2014) to find that i had captured a lot more than i could have imagined.  

there is a total of 18 images in the 28 second sequence. each image has a minimum of 2 ufos and the maximum i have found is 7 objects. it looks like i'm restricted to ten images so i won't post the edited and circled versions and stick to the best ones.

3193,3194,and 3195 have 3 ufos.
3196 has 2.
3197 has 3.
3199 has 4.
3203 has 4.
3204 has 5.
3205 has 7.
3206 has 7.

if mufon would like to see more images then please send me a private email.
content.summary: Multiple daylight ufos over victoria b.C.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying on a lounge chair at the eastern end of the swimming pool at the motel i am a guest of, facing west toward the afternoon sun at exactly 5:30 p.M. when i observed a shiny object reflecting the sunlight, rapidly approaching from wnw to ese or from 260° toward 80° at approximately 10,000 feet.
i was wearing mirrored swim goggles to keep the sun out of my eyes and the sky was completely clear so i had an excellent view of the object. as it got closer to directly overhead, i realized that it was teardrop shaped with the point to the rear and very shiny like mercury.
the object appeared to jog slightly, to it's right and left in no particular pattern nor timing and was moving at a steady, high rate of speed. as it passed over, i also observed what appeared to be a commercial airline craft to the south, which was possibly at about 25,000 to 30,000 feet elevation.
the shiny object appeared to be about half the length of the jet and was traveling at about 4 times the speed. as the aircraft was heading more towards straight east, i do not believe that they were in pursuit of the object nor if they even observed it.
i regret that i did not have my cell phone with me to try to get a photo but had i attempted to get it from my room the object would have been gone when i returned.
i was in the u.S. air force as a flying crewchief for 12 years and am quite familiar with aircraft types and capabilities, so i know that the object i witnessed was not any type of aircraft i have ever seen, but i did see an identical object about 9 years ago, just outside the city limits of baxley, ga
on that occasion, i and several other drivers pulled over to the sides of the highway and observed the object pass slowly across the highway at about 5:00 p.M. at approximately 1000 feet, move south about 1 mile and hover over the high-tension power lines running from hatch nuclear power plant where i was working at the time.
the object seemed to have a shimmery space between it and the power lines for a few minutes and then i observed what appeared to be a military aircraft, much like an awacs or 135 flying down towards the object, at which time the object started to move away from the power lines toward the south and suddenly accelerated to an incredible speed and went out of sight. the military aircraft also turned south and headed out in pursuit.
content.summary: Shiny teardrop quick flyover at barstow, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed and i have a huge window next to my bed and saw a cigar shaped object in standing position flying smoothly across the sky in the same distance a helicopter would be. it was windows, metal and reflective giving off light. never saw an object like it before in any movie or in real life or anywhere, books included. not a helicopter, not a jet. it was a flying object that looked like it was the letter "i", i've only seen flat objects flying. we just had an earthquake here last night in the bay area, a 6.0 one, so maybe it's related. anyway, i was still dazed over the earthquake when i saw this so i was too dumbfounded to take a picture with my cell phone.
content.summary: Looked like a standing cigar-shapped object flying across the sky, reflective windows and metal. it was in the standing position though which was really weird. not a helicopter or jet.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my brother in laws visiting and decided to go out side to get some fresh air. as i was standing on the porch looking towards the south at the grain elevator across the street i looked in the sky and seen what i thought was a plane as it moved ttowards the southeast i lost site or of it so i walked down the driveway to get a better look. as i got closer i knew it couldn't of been a plane of any kind. it was a ball of light vary bright moving slower than a normal plane would. vary weird i thought so i ran in to the house and got the first person i seen witch was my sister in law. i told her what i thought i seen in the sky. she came out with me and i went to show her the object but it was to late it was gone. as i looked for it she spotted it over south above the elevator. i told her that it couldn't of been the same one i saw at first. it had moved to far to be the same one. we stood watching the object move slow slowly across the sky. as we followed it moving southwest it was gaining elevation until it finally disappeared. she went in the house and got her husband and my wife so they could witness these objects in the sky. after it was gone we seen 3 more one moving to the east and the other 2 moving southwest in different locations. they would gain elevation and disappear and reappear in different locations. the one moving towards the east was flying low and was just as bright as the others until the brightness went away and turned a red orange color for less than a minute then went back before it disappear also. it was amazing and wieard at the same time.
content.summary: Vary bright ball of light objects moving slowly changing directions gain altitude and disappear and reappear in different locations

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on bink,s forest dr. @ approx 10;15 pm 8-16-14 i observed what i thought were two lights coming towards from a plane (one on each wing tip) but they were the same color (yellowish red and orangeish) when i realized what i was possibly seeing,i immediately stopped the car in the middle left turn lane (my wife was with me and we both saw them) i jumped out of the car with my cell phone turned on the camera, my wife was looking out the passenger window(it was rolled down) they were almost directly overhead.The third light was trailing the front 2 (looked identical) the front 2 came together as 1 unit and turn to head west and third light was a little slower then it also turned to head west. the pictures i took show the lights and as usual not great detail, the 2 coming together with a beam joining them. the 3rd one is round, but has a more pronounced glow on the right(its left) side the whole experience lasted from 5-6 mins. there was no sound or any noise, the sky was clear and no moon.The pictures (in my opinion) are better on my cell phone-we down loaded them to my computer
content.summary: Driving south observed what i thought was two lites on plane wing tips.3 lights then first 2 combined and all 2 went west

content.detailedDescription:
I am including another picture i found to a previous report i submitted on august 20th, 2014.  i found this picture of a cigar shaped object, much closer than the other 2 photos i submitted earlier.  this object was larger and closer to the ground.  it only appears in this photo at this height and direction.  this photo was taken less than 3 minutes from the time i had taken my other 2 photos that were submitted.  

quick recap:  i took all my pictures around 6:20pm (est)on 8-19-2014 of a storm that had a wall cloud.  this object only appeared in 3 of my pictures out of approximately 145-150 shots.  i am looking due west (heydenreich rd is about a half a mile west of my residence and i am just south of m-59).  this object is at it's lowest point of the three pictures i have of it.  it is larger, but fainter, than the other pictures.  i took another picture of the exact area (approximately 10 seconds later) and it shows no object. it made no sound, was not seen as i was taking the picture, and this wasn't on a "continuous mode" while shooting it with my nikon d3100 w/18-55mm lens camera.  it appears to be camouflaged/cloaked, but it does show itself in some photos.

with less than 3 minutes this object moved to the southwest of my residence, then to the south.  those are the pictures i submitted earlier.  
i hope you can view all three pictures as part of a timeline with this object. 
 
i am including the original picture, an "enhanced" (contrast/brightness/cropped) picture and a zoomed in, but unenhanced picture.
sorry, i wasn't able to include this picture with my earlier report.  i just found out about it when i looked through the 100+ pictures a couple of days ago.  thank you.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object behind a storm wall cloud.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:15 pm on august 23, 2014 i went outside to have a cigarette. i looked up towards the se sky and saw a glowing, white, spherical-shaped object hovering there. it looked fairly large too, maybe the size of a golf ball at arms length. it was making absolutely no noise. the object then started to slowly move towards the se. i quickly ran to the door to get my mom to come look at it. she came out right away and i pointed out the object in the sky to her. she saw it too, but by this time, the object had already gotten smaller. (approx. the size of a penny by the time my mom saw it.)it paused again in the sky, hovered for a moment, then once again started traversing towards the se. as we watched the object, it began to get smaller, and as it got smaller, it turned an amber color, then orange, finally turning a deep red color before it completely disappeared.
content.summary: White, spherical-shaped object observed hovering in se sky. traveled short distance in se path, object then started getting smaller, turning orange then red right before completely disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi , 
 
this evening at 9.51 pm my husband and i were coming back from visiting relatives on lowestoft seafront suffolk uk , i was driving past asda heading in a westly direction towards nicholas everetts park oulton broad when my husband said there are 4 bright orange moving lights in the sky ahead of us in a straight line , as we got closer to the roundabout one light suddenly disappeared ,we lost view of them when we turned round the roundabout. we had not ever seen anything like this before, 
 
has anyone else seen these lights this evening ?
content.summary: 4 glowing orange lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i notice an orange see through bell shape object float about 200 to 300 feet above the ground, headed north then turned 90 degrees east.No sound at all watched it until it disapaered.
content.summary: Orange glowing see through bell shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Laying in bed noticed a light come from behind next door neighbors trees.
at first i thought it was a dandelion seed floating and catching light from nearby lampost. but it moved beyond the reach of the street light and continued to pulsate. it hovered from right hand side to left hand side. it dissapeard behind the tree/fence in my back garden, the tracked back to the right hand side stopping above my fence (2 meters high, probably 2-3 meters beyond the fence) as i got up and stared at the object it shot upwards very fast. this was the only direct movement made by the object. all over movements seemed to be hovering, slow and indirect. when the object moved upwards it moved arrow straight and very fast. i didn't realise that the object was present for so long. initially i thought it was seconds but it was close to 10 minutes. i didn't have any thoughts or feelings when noticing the object. felt "energised" and "positive" afterwards. still a little unsure as to what i saw, but sure of a sensible reasoning. thanks
content.summary: White pulsating light hovered over rear fence seen through bedroom window

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on highway 85, i spotted a spherical object approximately 500-600 in altitude while looking west - southwest about 5 miles south of crestview,  florida.  the spherical object appeared to move in a southerly direction very slowly,  then hover for approximately 30 seconds. the object had a grey underlying color with a white to blue - white glow. while the object was hovering, i observed the glow to brighten intensely to a bright white color for approximately 5 seconds, then return to a blue - white glow. the object then began to move again in a southerly direction, then simply disappeared.
content.summary: Round spherical object was spotted approximately 500-600 feet off ground with intense white light

content.detailedDescription: Object was first observed after blinking once up in the sky then it proceeded to move directly overhead of us at approximately 100-200 feet above in a straight line. it stayed a constant yellowish wite color as it went overhead. our dog had been laying calmly outside and immediately got up and started barking and barking and wanted to go inside. my husband let her out of her lot and she went immediately to the door to go inside like she was upset and scared and wanted to get inside the house.  he took 3 photos with his cell phone as it went above us. as it was above us he said he could tell it had depth to it. it then flashed 2 to 3 times and was green in color and then it completely disappeared.  right after this happened we saw 3 planes flying closely together in a straight line flying east to west.  the object flew  from nw to se on a 140 degree bearing. we could tell these were planes because they were higher in the sky and were blinking in white and red. we have seen planes many times before in the sky at night above our house.  this all happened around 9:30 pm and lasted for 4-5 mins. the object made no sound whatsoever.
content.summary: Object was first observed after blinking once up in the sky then it proceeded to move directly overhead of us at approximately 100-200 feet above in a straight line. it stayed a constant yellowish wite color as it went overhead.

content.detailedDescription: That night my friend and i were getting ready to go fishing when out of no where he pointed out a bunch of orbs in the sky.My wife and i both looked up and saw over 30 orbs of white lights heading from northwest to southwest,the lights where pulsating and moving around in no particular pattern or formation .The orbs moved south off the ocean about a half mile to a mile above the coast of dana point harbor. after a few minutes of observing we all saw a orb chang path and shoot out into space with a flash and then another one did the same,the orbs also moved what seemed to be through one another,as they began to leave our sight the orbs rose higher into different directions to resemble existing stars in the sky.We all where very exited and talked about it all night in amazement. we also talked to a man passing by that saw the same thing and was also amazed as well.
content.summary: I was in the dana point harbor and my friend pointed out the moving orbs to me and my wife.

content.detailedDescription: While me and my girlfriend were outside in the yard i saw a bright white light off in the distance, so i started recording on my phone. the object was coming in our direction, the lights from it were changing colors also it had flickering lights on the outside what suggest to me it's an airplane but after zooming in on the smaller lights on the outside of it, the lights to me look similar to orbs. there is a small airport around here but this thing was real low and had no sound at all and what the lights were doing didn't seem like it was a plane or helicopter. i thought i would send this video with a still shot i got off the video, how i got it was  pressing pause and play while zoomed in.  i don't know if it is a shadow of an object underneath the bright light we couldn't really identify a shape because it was dark and no moonlight was present. i don't have a computer to really check it out, so take a look at the video and still shot and let me know what you think,  thanks
content.summary: Me and my girlfriend was standing outside i saw a bright unusual light  i started recording on my phone it was low and moving toward our direction

content.detailedDescription: I woke up around 130:am,i decided to go out and have a smoke, i was sitting on my front porch step and just looking up at the stars, i was sitting facing north as i always do. i was looking to the north and then looked almost straight up, that's when i seen the object. it was only visible for the time that the light was on, seconds.I did not see the shape of the object besides the shape from the light. it did appear that the object matched the light shape? but i cant be 100% for sure, to be honest it did alarm me and i quickly stepped under the roof of my porch and went back in the house,when i went back in i grabbed my flash and headed back out side to see if the object was still visible. it was gone.
content.summary: I was sitting out side and looked up and seen the object, almost straight above my home, it was around 230am.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a large red and white light in the eastern sky out of my kitchen window while i was doing the dishes. it was the night of the "super moon" and meteor shower. the light appeared slightly larger than what a planet would look like, but smaller than an ordinary sized moon view. it was strange because it appeared red on the left side and white on the right side. i was amazed at how still it was, as if it were a star and not any kind of craft at all. the light hovered for a few seconds and moved quickly straight up. i realized i knew of no aircraft that could do that. it then moved straight down. i called for my husband and adult son to come and look. we went out onto our deck to watch. it hovered perfectly still between each movement. the light moved left and then right. i viewed it through my telephoto lens and saw a large orange orb with other colored orbs behind it. the orb moved all around and seemed to almost disappear at one point. the orb first seemed round, but then appeared somewhat hexagonal. the light then changed into four lights, two yellow lights surrounded by red lights and one green light, and one light. you can see on the video how bright the centers of the lights were. it appeared to move forward and then backward. we all felt we were witnessing a ufo. the lights pulsated rather than blinked. the lights appeared to land behind some distant trees. later, when i analyzed the video frame by frame,i noticed a possible discharge cloud below two of the lights.
content.summary: Saw a light with red on the left side and white on the right. it appeared slightly bigger than a planet . it changed into an orange hexigram shaped orb with other colors behind it. it moved all around, then changed into four different colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) was outside just looking at stars when he observed directly overhead, a bright white star-like object traveling on a ne path, about 4000 ft altitude.  the object stopped wobbled side to side then continued on a ne path and disappeared just above the tree-line.
content.summary: Bright white star-like object traveling on a ne path, about 4000 ft altitude.  the object stopped wobbled side to side then continued on a ne path and disappeared just above the tree-line.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the huntington beach pier with my family and i noticed a pirate ship kite like and i toked couple of pictures of it with my phone and when i was looking at the pictures i noticed that elongated object in the background of the kite going right through the clouds like it was taking off from the ocean it was like a 45 degrees angle and i never see an object like this before and i saw so many ufo's before in argentina, that's were i from and that country its known as a hot spot for ufo's but nothing like this.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a kite on the pier and when i saw a close up of it i notice that glowing object on the background, like it toked off from the ocean
